modelÂ¶

Modules

model.converter

This module contains models for the power converter.

model.im_drive

This module includes a continuous-time model for an induction motor drive.

model.interfaces

This module includes the solver functions as well as the models for PWM carrier comparison and computational delay.

model.mech

This module contains continuous-time models for mechanical subsystems.

model.sm_drive

This module includes continuous-time models for a permmanent-magnet synchronous motor drive.
